description:
Ninth grader and master swordsman Musashi Kenzaki, who sees Taiki as his rival, begins to undergo kendo training with a Digimon named Kotemon. As this goes on, incidents of rampant test attacks begin to occur! Sensing that a Digimon might be involved, Tagiru sets out on a Digimon Hunt with Gumdramon. They then discover that Musashi is behind the test attacks. Musashi insists that he was fighting fair and square, that they were proper duels and not test attacks, but in the next moment he`s surrounded by a black aura...! Is it Kotemon`s doing, or is another Digimon behind this...?! Tagiru and company take a stand to find the truth behind Musashi`s black aura!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Digimon Kendo Match! The Blade of Kotemon Approaches!!
Digimon Kendou Shoubu! Kotemon no Yaiba ga Semaru!!
デジモン剣道勝負! コテモンの刃が迫る!!
